channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [QUADRANT] Quadrant Televentures Ltd. to Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and H1 of FY2025-2026 on Feb 11, 2026
item.description:
Quadrant Televentures Ltd. has informed the BSE that its Board of Directors will meet on February 11, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025. The company is under Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process as per the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code. The unaudited standalone financial results for the same period were submitted earlier. The trading window for dealing in the securities of the company remains closed till the financial results are declared.

  • Quadrant Televentures Ltd. to consider and approve unaudited financial results for Q3 and H1 of FY2025-2026 on Feb 11, 2026
  • Company is under Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process as per the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code
  • Unaudited standalone financial results for Q3 and H1 of FY2025-2026 were submitted earlier
  • Trading window for dealing in the securities of the company remains closed till the financial results are declared

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Quadrant Televentures Limited-$ | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [PURPLEFIN] Purple Finance Raises â‚¹69 Crore Through Equity Warrants
item.description:
Purple Finance Ltd. has approved an equity raise of â‚¹69.30 crore through equity warrants, comprising 1.26 crore warrants issued at â‚¹55 per warrant. The company has been following a disciplined, phased approach to capital raising since its successful listing in June 2024. With the recent fundraising, Purple Finance has raised a total of â‚¹232 crore. The company has expanded to 45 branches, with Assets Under Management (AUM) of ~ â‚¬210 crore as of January 2026 and a team of approximately 430 employees. Purple Finance remains focused on responsible growth in the SME and retail lending ecosystem, creating long-term value for its 3,800+ equity shareholders and 4,000+ NCD holders.

  • Purple Finance raises â‚¹69.30 crore through equity warrants.
  • The company has raised a total of â‚¹232 crore since its listing in June 2024.
  • Purple Finance has expanded to 45 branches and has a team of approximately 430 employees.
  • As of January 2026, the company's Assets Under Management (AUM) is ~ â‚¬210 crore.
  • The company aims to create long-term value for its 3,800+ equity shareholders and 4,000+ NCD holders.

item.title: [EXCELSOFT] Excelsoft Technologies Ltd Announces Changes in Senior Management and Key Managerial Personnel
item.description:
Excelsoft Technologies Ltd has announced changes in its senior management and key managerial personnel. The changes in senior management include designation changes for Mr. Jambardi Ramanna Maheshkumar, Mr. Ajay Ramesh, and Mr. Prashanth H M Kulkarni. The company has also announced the resignation of Mr. Venkatesh Dayananda as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer and the appointment of Mr. S.M. Adithya Jain as the new Company Secretary, Chief Compliance Officer, and Chief Investor Relations Officer.

  • Changes in the responsibilities and designation of Senior Management Personnel at Excelsoft Technologies Ltd
  • Resignation of Mr. Venkatesh Dayananda as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
  • Appointment of Mr. S.M. Adithya Jain as Company Secretary, Chief Compliance Officer, and Chief Investor Relations Officer

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Excelsoft Technologies Ltd | Category: Management Change

item.title: [EXCELSOFT] Excelsoft Technologies Ltd Reports Q3 FY2025 Financial Results with 2,484.41 Million Total Income
item.description:
Excelsoft Technologies Ltd, a leading technology company, has reported its financial results for the third quarter ended December 31, 2025. The company's total income stood at 2,484.41 Million INR, with a profit for the period of 97.33 Million INR. The board also announced changes in senior management and key managerial personnel. The company's financial results were reviewed by the audit committee and approved by the board of directors.

  • Excelsoft Technologies Ltd reported a total income of 2,484.41 Million INR for Q3 FY2025
  • The company's profit for the period was 97.33 Million INR
  • Changes in senior management and key managerial personnel announced
  • The financial results were reviewed by the audit committee and approved by the board of directors
  • The company's equity shares were listed on National Stock Exchange of India Limited and BSE Limited on November 26, 2025

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Excelsoft Technologies Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [SEAMECLTD] Seamec Ltd's Vessel SEAMEC II Charter Hire Period Extended with ONGC Until August 2026
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Seamec Ltd has informed about the extension of the charter hire period for its vessel SEAMEC II with ONGC. The contract period is now extended until August 25, 2026. The terms and conditions of the original contract remain unchanged. This announcement was made on February 06, 2026, at 22:33 hours.

  • Seamec Ltd's Vessel SEAMEC II charter hire period extended with ONGC
  • Extension until August 25, 2026
  • Original contract terms and conditions remain unchanged

Company: SEAMEC LTD. | Category: Deals

item.title: [NLCINDIA] NLC India Ltd Issues and Allocates Commercial Paper Worth â‚¹ 1,300 Crores
item.description:
NLC India Ltd has issued and allotted 26,000 Nos. of Commercial Paper, each with a face value of â‚¹ 5,00,000. The total value of these commercial papers amounts to â‚¹ 1,300 crores, divided into two parts: â‚¹ 800 crores and â‚¹ 500 crores. This disclosure is in accordance with Regulation 30 and 51 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • NLC India Ltd has issued and allotted 26,000 Commercial Papers.
  • Each Commercial Paper has a face value of â‚¹ 5,00,000.
  • The total value of the Commercial Papers is â‚¹ 1,300 crores.
  • The Commercial Papers are issued in two parts: â‚¹ 800 crores and â‚¹ 500 crores.
  • This disclosure is in accordance with SEBI regulations.

item.title: [GODIGIT] Go Digit General Insurance Ltd Faces GST Search Regulations Inspection
item.description:
Go Digit General Insurance Ltd has disclosed a search conducted by the Directorate General of Goods & Service Tax Intelligence, Gurugram Zonal Unit pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule Il of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. The search commenced on 5th February 2026 and concluded on 6th February 2026. The company does not foresee any material impact on its financials, operations, or other activities due to this search.

  • Go Digit General Insurance Ltd faced a search conducted by the Directorate General of Goods & Service Tax Intelligence, Gurugram Zonal Unit.
  • The search commenced on 5th February 2026 and concluded on 6th February 2026.
  • No official document has been issued regarding any adverse findings.
  • Summons have been issued to representatives of the Company to appear before the Authority for further questioning and statements.
  • The company does not foresee any material impact on its financials, operations, or other activities due to this search.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Go Digit General Insurance Ltd | Category: Legal

item.title: [EXCELSOFT] Excelsoft Technologies Ltd Announces Q3 Results, Changes in Senior Management, and KMP Appointments
item.description:
Excelsoft Technologies Ltd has announced its un-audited financial results for the third quarter ended December 31, 2025. The company's revenue stands at INR 1,631.64 million, with a profit before tax of INR 318.34 million. The board also approved changes in the designation of Senior Management Personnel and announced the resignation of the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, along with the appointment of a new Company Secretary, Chief Compliance Officer, and Chief Investor Relations Officer.

  • Excelsoft Technologies Ltd reports a revenue of INR 1,631.64 million for Q3 2025
  • The company records a profit before tax of INR 318.34 million for the quarter
  • Changes in the designation of Senior Management Personnel announced
  • Resignation of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer confirmed
  • Appointment of new Company Secretary, Chief Compliance Officer, and Chief Investor Relations Officer approved

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Excelsoft Technologies Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [METSL] Maestros Electronics Secures Rs. 1.99 Crore Order from MD National Health Mission Jaipur
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Maestros Electronics & Telecommunications Systems Ltd has announced that it has received a purchase order from MD National Health Mission Jaipur for the supply of 378 pieces of METSL 12 Channels ECG Machine. The contract is governed by the General Terms and Conditions and is valued at Rs. 1,99,52,730 exclusive of applicable taxes. The order is to be executed between February 03, 2026, and December 31, 2027. Neither the promoter of the company nor the promoter group/group companies have any interest in the entity that awarded the order.

  • Maestros Electronics has received a purchase order from MD National Health Mission Jaipur
  • The order is for the supply of 378 pieces of METSL 12 Channels ECG Machine
  • The contract value is Rs. 1,99,52,730 exclusive of applicable taxes
  • The order is to be executed between February 03, 2026, and December 31, 2027
  • Neither the promoter of the company nor the promoter group/group companies have any interest in the entity that awarded the order

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Maestros Electronics & Telecommunications Systems Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [VALLABHSQ] Vallabh Steels Ltd. to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results on 13th February, 2026
item.description:
Vallabh Steels Ltd. has announced a Board of Directors meeting on 13th February, 2026 to consider and approve the un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ending 31st December, 2025. The meeting is scheduled in accordance with Regulation 29(1) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. Additionally, in line with the Companyâ€™s Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading, the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed from 1st January, 2026 until 48 hours after the declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results.

  • Vallabh Steels Ltd. to approve Q3 and nine months financial results on 13th February, 2026
  • The meeting is scheduled in accordance with Regulation 29(1) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
  • Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed from 1st January, 2026
